title: League of Legends Quotes Quiz v1.1.4 Android
description:
Quiz (trivia) is based on champion quotes of the MOBA game called League of Legends. Questions of various difficulty will allow you to fill knowledge gaps about champion quotes, as well as provide much entertainment. Check your knowledge of League of Legends with our quiz! For now quotes were written in English! 


Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 280 quotes!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3 game modes - Classic, Sudden Death and Time Challenge!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compendium - All quotes used in the program sorted by champions in one place!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Score depends on the time and number of correct answers - Who of your friends will earn the most points?
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Plenty of configuration options!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Completely free!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And much, much more...

Game modes:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In Classic mode user tries to guess 15 quotes. The wrong answers does not interrupt the game.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In Sudden Death mode user tries to guess 30 quotes, but when user selects a wrong answer loses.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In Time Challenge mode user tries to guess 30 quotes. Response time for ALL questions is limited (correct answer adds some extra time) and if it runs out user loses. The wrong answer does not interrupt the game.

This is an unofficial app. League of Legends belongs to Riot Games.
